Name: SFN
ToolTip: System Frame Number, Value: 0-1023

Name: Slot
ToolTip: Value: 0-319

Name: nPDUs
ToolTip: Number of PDUs that are included in this message. All PDUs in the message are numbered in order. Value 0-255

Name: nGroup
ToolTip: Number of UE Groups included in this message. Value 0-255

Name: PDUType
ToolTip: 0: PDCCH, 1: PDSCH,  2: CSI-RS, 3: SSB

Name: PDUSize
ToolTip: Size of the PDU control information (in bytes). This length value includes the 4 bytes required for the PDU type and PDU size parameters.

Name: pduBitmap
ToolTip: Bitmap indicating presence of optional PDUs Bit 0: pdschPtrs - Indicates PTRS included (FR2) Bit 1:cbgRetxCtrl (Present when CBG based retransmit is used) All other bits reserved

Name: RNTI
ToolTip: The RNTI used for identifying the UE when receiving the PDU

Name: pduIndex
ToolTip: PDU index incremented for each PDSCH PDU sent in TX control message. This is used to associate control information to data and is reset every slot. Value: 0 - 65535

Name: BWPsize
ToolTip: Number of contiguous PRBs allocated to the BWP, Value: 1->275

Name: BWPStart
ToolTip: Bandwidth part start RB index from reference CRB, Value: 0->274

Name: SubcarrierSpacing
ToolTip: Value:0->4

Name: CyclicPrefix
ToolTip: Cyclic prefix type, 0: Normal; 1: Extended

Name: NrOfCodewords
ToolTip: Number of code words for this RNTI (UE) Value: 1 - 2

Name: targetCodeRate
ToolTip: Target coding rate [TS38.212 sec 5.4.2.1 and 38.214 sec 5.1.3.1]. This is the number of information bits per 1024 coded bits expressed in 0.1 bit units

Name: qamModOrder
ToolTip: QAM modulation [TS38.212 sec 5.4.2.1 and 38.214 sec 5.1.3.1] Value: 2,4,6,8

Name: mcsIndex
ToolTip: MCS index [TS38.214, sec 5.1.3.1], should match value sent in DCI Value : 0-31

Name: mcsTable
ToolTip: MCS-Table-PDSCH [TS38.214, sec 5.1.3.1] 0: notqam256 1: qam256 2: qam64LowSE

Name: rvIndex
ToolTip: Redundancy version index [TS38.212, Table 5.4.2.1-2 and 38.214, Table 5.1.2.1-2], should match value sent in DCI Value : 0-3

Name: TBSize
ToolTip: Transmit block size (in bytes) [TS38.214 sec 5.1.3.2] Value: 0-65535

Name: dataScramblingId
ToolTip: dataScramblingIdentityPdsch [TS38.211, sec 7.3.1.1] It equals the higher-layer parameter Datascrambling- Identity if configured and the RNTI equals the C-RNTI, otherwise L2 needs to set it to physical cell id. Value: 0-65535

Name: nrOfLayers
ToolTip: Number of layers [TS38.211, sec 7.3.1.3] Value : 1-8

Name: transmissionScheme
ToolTip: PDSCH transmission schemes [TS38.214, sec 5.1.1] 0: Up to 8 transmission layers

Name: refPoint
ToolTip: Reference point for PDSCH DMRS, Value: 0 - 1.

Name: dlDmrsSymbPos
ToolTip: DMRS symbol positions [TS38.211, sec 7.4.1.1.2 and Tables 7.4.1.1.2-3 and 7.4.1.1.2-4]. Bitmap occupying the 14 LSBs with: bit 0: first symbol and for each bit 0: no DMRS 1: DMRS

Name: dmrsConfigType
ToolTip: DL DMRS config type [TS38.211, sec 7.4.1.1.2], 0: type 1 1: type 2

Name: dlDmrsScramblingId
ToolTip: DL-DMRS-Scrambling-ID, 0-65535

Name: SCID
ToolTip: DMRS sequence initialization [TS38.211, sec 7.4.1.1.2]. Should match what is sent in DCI 1_1, otherwise set to 0. Value : 0-1

Name: numDmrsCdmGrpsNoData
ToolTip: Number of DM-RS CDM groups without data [TS38.212 sec 7.3.1.2.2] [TS38.214 Table 4.1-1] it determines the ratio of PDSCH EPRE to DM-RS EPRE. Value: 1-3

Name: dmrsPorts
ToolTip: DMRS ports. [TS38.212 7.3.1.2.2] provides description between DCI 1-1 content and DMRS ports. Bitmap occupying the 11 LSBs with: bit 0: antenna port 1000 bit 11: antenna port 1011 and for each bit 0: DMRS port not used 1: DMRS port used

Name: resourceAlloc
ToolTip: Resource Allocation Type [TS38.214, sec 5.1.2.2] 0: Type 0 1: Type 1

Name: rbBitmap
ToolTip: For resource alloc type 0. TS 38.212 V15.0.x, 7.3.1.2.2 bitmap of RBs, 273 rounded up to multiple of 32. This bitmap is in units of VRBs. LSB of byte 0 of the bitmap represents the first RB of the bwp

Name: rbStart
ToolTip: For resource allocation type 1. [TS38.214, sec 5.1.2.2.2] The starting resource block within the BWP for this PDSCH. Value: 0-274

Name: rbSize
ToolTip: For resource allocation type 1. [TS38.214, sec 5.1.2.2.2] The number of resource block within for this PDSCH. Value: 1-275

Name: VRBtoPRBMapping
ToolTip: VRB-to-PRB-mapping [TS38.211, sec 7.3.1.6] 0: non-interleaved 1: interleaved with RB size 2 2: Interleaved with RB size 4

Name: StartSymbolIndex
ToolTip: Start symbol index of PDSCH mapping from the start of the slot, S. [TS38.214, Table 5.1.2.1-1] Value: 0-13

Name: NrOfSymbols
ToolTip: PDSCH duration in symbols, L [TS38.214, Table 5.1.2.1-1] Value: 1-14

Name: numPRGs
ToolTip: Number of PRGs spanning this allocation. Value : 1-275

Name: prgSize
ToolTip: Size in RBs of a precoding resource block group (PRG) â€“ to which same precoding and digital beamforming gets applied. Value: 1-275

Name: digBFInterfaces
ToolTip: Number of STD ant ports (parallel streams) feeding into the digBF Value: 0-255

Name: PMidx
ToolTip: Index to precoding matrix (PM) pre-stored at cell configuration. Note: If precoding is not used this parameter should be set to 0. Value: 0-65535.

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

Name: PMidx
ToolTip: Index to precoding matrix (PM) pre-stored at cell configuration. Note: If precoding is not used this parameter should be set to 0. Value: 0-65535.

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

ToolTip: Index to precoding matrix (PM) pre-stored at cell configuration. Note: If precoding is not used this parameter should be set to 0. Value: 0-65535.

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

ToolTip: Index to precoding matrix (PM) pre-stored at cell configuration. Note: If precoding is not used this parameter should be set to 0. Value: 0-65535.

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

Name: PMidx
ToolTip: Index to precoding matrix (PM) pre-stored at cell configuration. Note: If precoding is not used this parameter should be set to 0. Value: 0-65535.

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

Name: powerControlOffset
ToolTip: Ratio of PDSCH EPRE to NZP CSI-RSEPRE [TS38.214, sec 5.2.2.3.1] Value :0-23 representing -8 to 15 dB in 1dB steps

Name: powerControlOffsetSS
ToolTip: Ratio of SSB/PBCH block EPRE to NZP CSI-RS EPRES [TS38.214, sec 5.2.2.3.1] Values: 0: -3dB, 1: 0dB, 2: 3dB, 3: 6dB

Name: PDUType
ToolTip: 0: PDCCH, 1: PDSCH,  2: CSI-RS, 3: SSB

Name: PDUSize
ToolTip: Size of the PDU control information (in bytes). This length value includes the 4 bytes required for the PDU type and PDU size parameters.

Name: physCellId
ToolTip: Physical cell ID. Value: 0-1007

Name: betaPss
ToolTip: PSS EPRE to SSS EPRE in a SS/PBCH block. Values: 0 = 0dB, 1 = 3dB

Name: ssbBlockIndex
ToolTip: SS/PBCH block index within a SSB burst set. Required for PBCH DMRS scrambling. Value: 0-63 (Lmax)

Name: ssbSubcarrierOffset
ToolTip: ssbSubcarrierOffset. Value: 0-31

Name: SsbOffsetPointA
ToolTip: Offset of lowest subcarrier of lowest resource block used for SS/PBCH block. Value: 0-2199

Name: bchPayloadFlag
ToolTip: A value indicating how the BCH payload is generated. This should match the PARAM/CONFIG TLVs. Value: 0: MAC generates the full PBCH payload, 1: PHY generates the timing PBCH bits 2: PHY generates the full PBCH payload

Name: bchPayload
ToolTip: BCH payload. The valid bits are indicated in the PARAM/CONFIG TLVs. If PARAM/CONFIG TLVs indicate MAC generates full bchPayload then the payload length is 31 bits with the 8 LSB bits being (SFN, half-radio frame bit, SS/PBCH block idx) [TS38.212 sec 7.1.1] Otherwise timing PBCH bits are generated by the PHY. And for bchPayload the 24 LSB are used.

Name: numPRGs
ToolTip: Number of PRGs spanning this allocation. Value : 1-275

Name: prgSize
ToolTip: Size in RBs of a precoding resource block group (PRG) â€“ to which same precoding and digital beamforming gets applied. Value: 1-275

ToolTip: Number of STD ant ports (parallel streams) feeding into the digBF Value: 0-255

ToolTip: Index to precoding matrix (PM) pre-stored at cell configuration. Note: If precoding is not used this parameter should be set to 0. Value: 0-65535.

ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

Name: nUe
ToolTip: Number of UE in this group For SU-MIMO, one group includes one UE only. For MU-MIMO, one group includes up to 12 UEs. Value 1 -> 12

Name: PduIdx
ToolTip: This value is an index for number of PDU identified by nPDU in this message, Value: 0 -> 255

Name: nUe
ToolTip: Number of UE in this group For SU-MIMO, one group includes one UE only. For MU-MIMO, one group includes up to 12 UEs. Value 1 -> 12

ToolTip: This value is an index for number of PDU identified by nPDU in this message, Value: 0 -> 255

Name: nUe
